hero.title: Spirit Awakening Medicine
hero.subtitle: Open the Gates of Remembrance
hero.tagline: The Sacred Medicine of Bufo Alvarius
hero.features: Ego Dissolution | Non-Dual Consciousness | Divine Remembrance
hero.disclaimer: [Not for everyone. Only for those who feel the call.]

whatIsBufo.transition: First, let's talk about the medicine itself.
whatIsBufo.title: The Sacred Medicine of Bufo Alvarius
whatIsBufo.subtitle: Die before you die
whatIsBufo.intro: The most potent and profound entheogenic compound on Earth
whatIsBufo.paragraph1: Bufo Alvarius—5-MeO-DMT—is the only substance that can reliably introduce individuals to a state of full non-dual awareness, override the energetic structure of the ego, and reveal the unitary nature of reality.
whatIsBufo.paragraph2: This is not a psychedelic. It is a sacred teacher of death and pure remembrance. The effects begin within
whatIsBufo.paragraph2Cont: of inhalation. Complete ego dissolution. Non-dual consciousness. The remembrance of what you've always been.
whatIsBufo.quote: This is not an offering we promote publicly. If you are here, you've been guided, invited, or felt the call. The toad is not for everyone, and it is not a shortcut. This path requires humility, surrender, and integration.

whoThisIsFor.title: This Medicine Is For...
whoThisIsFor.subtitle: (And who it's not for)
forList: Those ready to die before they die
Those who've done deep inner work and feel called to complete something
Those seeking death of illusion, not an experience
Those ready to surrender and integrate
Those who can no longer pretend
notForList: Those with untreated trauma or psychosis
whoThisIsFor.quote: You're not broken. You're not lost. You're initiating.

threePhaseJourney.transition: This work unfolds in three essential movements:
threePhaseJourney.title: The Three-Phase Journey
threePhaseJourney.description: Sacred medicine work requires preparation, presence, and integration. This is not a shortcut. This is the work of a lifetime.

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: 1-2 sessions to assess emotional readiness, anchor your nervous system, and create a sacred container for what's to come.

ceremony.title: Ceremony
ceremony.description: The sacred passage. Held in small, intimate settings (2-4 people max) in Mazunte, Oaxaca, Mexico. Full energetic holding and support.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Where the real work happens. Post-journey support, meaning-making, and embodying the remembrance into your daily life.

threePhaseJourney.quote:
Insight without integration is just spiritual entertainment.
This isn't a quick fix. This isn't a weekend workshop.
This is the work of a lifetime—compressed into the time your soul needs.

seriLineage.title: Nina & Astral
seriLineage.subtitle: Initiated by Seri Tribe Elders in the Sonoran Desert, Mexico
seriLineage.paragraph1: This work is held with deep reverence for the indigenous lineage from which it comes. Nina and Astral have been initiated as daughter and son of the Seri Tribe by elders in the desert of Sonora, Mexico.
seriLineage.paragraph2: Years of training in trauma-informed approaches, energy healing, and the sacred art of holding space for ego dissolution. Guest speakers in facilitator training programs. Hundreds of ceremonies guided with safety, presence, and deep respect.
seriLineage.quote: We have sat with the medicine. We have died, dissolved, returned, and broken again. We hold this work with reverence. If you feel called, let's walk slowly. This is sacred territory—not a service.

imageQuote.quote:
Die before you die, and discover
there is no death.

ceremonyGallery.transition: This is where it happens - the spaces we create for this sacred work:

testimonials.transition: But don't just take our word for it. Here's what others have experienced:
testimonials.title: Voices From The Journey

items.quote: The healings I went through with Nina & Astral were deep and transformative. Through their practice, they are able to prise issues from the mind and release them through the heart. Their compassion and belief allows vulnerability in the unknown, acceptance of ugly realities and enables you to rise above blocks we accumulate along with our lives. They showed me how to love myself, that experience is strength, and our power runs further than this body.
items.name: Holly

items.quote: Nina & Astral gave me a gift, by healing wounds that had been present in me since I was a child. We cleared issues that were causing me to have weird dynamics with women. They set me free and I'll never be the same. They helped me become a man. I feel confident in myself and my abilities now.
items.name: Jon

items.quote: I could feel their presence in the higher realms—helping me to go deeper into the quest. I felt secure, held, seen, and fully accepted so I could trust and surrender. I feel so young! Clear and joyful, like a child. I accept where I'm at and know myself better.
items.name: Anonymous

items.quote: The work with Nina & Astral was one of the most profound transformations I have ever had. They take you straight into the subconscious mind so together you find the cause of your limiting beliefs and clear them. This is the healing of the future, in the 5th dimension, working in the quantum field that enables healing to be instantaneous.
items.name: Hazel

pricingTransparency.transition: This work requires investment - of yourself, your time, and your resources. Here's what that looks like:
pricingTransparency.title: Investment & Accessibility
pricingTransparency.subtitle: Transparent pricing. Sliding scale available.

ceremony.title: Ceremony
ceremony.includes: Includes pre-ceremony consultation, ceremony, integration within 48hrs, 2-week follow-up

accessibility.title: Accessibility
items: Sliding scale available based on financial situation
accessibility.quote: No one is ever turned away for lack of funds when the call is genuine.

readyToBegin.title: Ready to Begin?
readyToBegin.quote: This work is never sold. Only offered.
readyToBegin.description: If you feel the call, begin with the application process. This is an invitation to discernment— for both of us. Not everyone is a fit. And that's sacred.
readyToBegin.disclaimer: Private application · Discernment process · Medical screening required
